content.description: Start at the large jug rail on the left side of the roof just under the lip, scamper your way right, pull the lip & finish in the juggy seam! It is possible to take this all the way up into the foliage above you but i would not recommend it to anyone who hasn't wrapped down and tested the flakes in the upper roof.

start on the good seams on the right side of the roof where the shelf meats the roof. climb through one small but good hooded edge to get to the lip, climb left pulling into the same topout as soot sprite.

the full stunner line through the featured roof, start low and left with feet on shelf and hands on good edges closest to shelf, tech, tension, hop & skip your way out the roof meeting up with soot sprite.

Start same as Radish Spirit on rightward trending seam. Climb to slot jug near the end of the seam and bust up and right through crimps and a crack to gain the large jug. Traverse out right to the large flat hold beneath the high roof to finish. FUN VARIANT: Try going from jug slot at end of seam to jug in two big moves. One big ole pull-through on midway edge.

Start same as Kamaji on good undercling edges with feet on shelves. Bust out the seam but THWOP a hard left to exit the roof on the left side. Pull up onto the face to finish. Shoulder-dabbing on the tree is likely.
content.location: Same start as Kamaji but cut left after a few moves.

content.description: an amazing overhanging roof on big stoney creek, climbs remain shaded and great spot for river shenanigans. Go when the water is low to avoid a treacherous stream crossing.
